MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G33 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out fault investigations at the Langdale Street substation and due to further investigations being required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 3:30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:26pm on Saturday 6th February 2021.
